Examines the filesystem object referred to by this directory entry and stores its attributes for retrieval with {{rlpt|status}}, {{rlpt|exists}}, {{rlpt|is_regular_file}}, and other status accessors.

If an error occurs, the value of any cached attributes is unspecified.
